p:
Conversely, others chose not to take the test because they are afraid of learning they are HIV positive.
Interviewers: Have you ever taken an HIV test?
Participant 9: It has been a long time…. I even fear because now I meet different men, so I don’t know whether they have infected me or not…. The truth is that now I can’t go for an HIV test. I will first wait and fall sick, then I go for a test. (31-year-old woman)
